articles.title: Australia imposes sanctions on Russian President Vladimir Putin’s daughters - PerthNow
articles.description: Australia has made an announcement regarding Russian President Vladimir Putin’s two daughters as the devastating war in Ukraine continues.
articles.content:
Australia has imposed financial sanctions on 147 more people including two of Russian President Vladimir Putins daughters in response to the war in Ukraine.

articles.author: Stuart Marsh
articles.title: Westpac ordered to pay $113 million over 'widespread compliance failures' - 9News
articles.description: Westpac has been ordered to pay a combined penalty of $113 million for what Australia's Federal Court heard was "widespread compliance failures".

articles.title: In A Horrible Mirror Of The Real World, Final Fantasy XIV Is Facing A Housing Crisis - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Final Fantasy XIV is currently grappling with an actual housing crisis. Broken features, artificial inflation, and a black market now threaten to bring the game's economy undone.
articles.content: In a weird case of art imitating life, Final Fantasy XIV Online players are being locked out of the game’s fictional housing market. Besieged by angry players, opportunistic guilds, and the disastrou… [+4621 chars]

articles.title: Federal election 2022: Poll shows WA voters prefer Anthony Albanese as an economic manager to Scott Morrison - The West Australian
articles.description: A surprise poll has revealed West Australians believe Anthony Albanese is a better economic manager than Scott Morrison just a week after the Labor leader’s disastrous campaign stumble on interest rates.
